pr_title: Correct handle empty affected isl set in reroute throttling

timeline.bodyText: I think there's no sense to reset "throttlingData.affectedIsl" if it's empty already. So "throttlingData.getAffectedIsl().isEmpty()" must go to the "else if" block.
timeline.author: sergii-iakovenko
